title: Memoir of the Mosquito territory : as respecting the voluntary cession of it to the crown of Great Britain : pointing out some of the many advantages to be derived from the occupation of that country : more especially after our ill success at Buenos-Ayres, as set forth in a memorial presented to the Right Honourable Lord Castlereagh, Secretary of State for the Colonies, &c. &c.
imprint: Printed for J. Hatchard, bookseller to His Majesty, opposite Albany, Piccadilly
author: J. Wright
